plot: Small-town journalist Leonard Crane starts making up stories to save his job but gets in trouble when one of his fabricated news pieces turns out to be true.
title: Big News from Grand Rock
plot_es: Small-town journalist Leonard Crane starts making up stories to save his job but gets in trouble when one of his fabricated news pieces turns out to be true.
plot_en: Small-town journalist Leonard Crane starts making up stories to save his job but gets in trouble when one of his fabricated news pieces turns out to be true.
